member.summary: Extensions on specifically for downloading package or package contents to the file system.

member.name: T:Jeevan.NuGetClient.Internals.SourceDetail
member.summary: Cached information about a NuGet source, so we don't need to retrieve it multiple times during the lifetime of the client.

member.name: F:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient._sourceCaches
member.summary: A cache of essential details for each source. This is initialized for each source whenever the source is accessed for the first time.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .
member.param: One or more NuGet sources that this instance will use to interact with the API.
member.exception: Thrown if no sources are specified.

member.name: P:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.Sources
member.summary: Gets the list of NuGet sources that this instance will query for any operation.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.GetPackageAsync(System.String,Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the specific version of a NuGet package (.nupkg file) as a .
member.param: The ID of the NuGet package.
The version of the NuGet package.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The NuGet package as a ; or null if the specific package was not found at any of the sources.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.GetPackageVersionsAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets all available versions of a NuGet package.
member.param: The ID of the NuGet package.
Indicates whether to include pre-release versions of the package.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A collection of all available versions of the package, in descending order. If the package is not found, an empty collection is returned.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.GetPackageLatestVersionAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the latest version of a NuGet package.
member.param: The ID of the NuGet package.
Indicates whether to consider pre-release versions of the package.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The latest version of the specified NuGet package; null if the package was not found.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.ForEachSource``1(Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient.SourceOperation{``0},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Helper method to run some logic over each NuGet source in sequence until a successful result is achieved. This method also retrieves and caches source details, if it is not already cached.
member.typeparam: The type of the result expected by the caller.
member.param: A delegate the specifies the action to run over each source.
A .
member.returns: A tuple of a indicating whether a successful result was achieved, and the result itself (if successful) or the default value (if unsuccessful).

The ID of the NuGet package.
Indicates whether to consider pre-release versions of the package when looking for the latest version.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClientExtensions.GetPackageContentsForTfmAsync(Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient,System.String,Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetVersion,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the contents of a NuGet package for specific target framework moniker (TFM).
member.param: The instance.
The ID of the NuGet package.
The version of the NuGet package.
The target framework moniker to get the contents for.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A sequence of objects, one for each file in the package.

member.name: M:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClientExtensions.GetPackageTfmsAsync(Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetClient,System.String,Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.param: The instance.
The ID of the NuGet package.
The version of the NuGet package.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A collection of available TFMs in the specified package; an empty sequence if the package was not found.

member.name: T:Jeevan.NuGetClient.NuGetVersion
member.summary: Represents a NuGet package version. This could either be compatible with Semantic Version ` (semver) or .NET assembly 4-part versions (Major.Minor.Build.Revision).
